search.name: Measurement Converter
search.description:
Convert units from one unit to another using ConvertIt.com. The second unit is optional.
Usage:
conv <unit1> [/to <unit2>]
conv /from:<unit1> [/to:<unit2>]
Examples:
conv 1/5 gallon
conv astronomical unit to football fields
conv /from:astronomical_unit /to:football_fields
